name: sudoku-solver
description: - **Game Initialization.**   Allow the user to select difficulty (Easy, Medium, Hard) and generate a Sudoku board accordingly. - **User Input.**   Enable users to add, remove, or edit numbers on the board. - **Hint System.**   Provide hints for empty cells. - **Solve Option.**   Display the complete solution to the Sudoku puzzle. - **Validation.**   Ensure user inputs and board states adhere to Sudoku rules. - **Multiple Games.**   Allow multiple games at once.
